item.title: Install Go on Mac with Homebrew
item.description: Precondition: macOS Big Sur 11.5.2 Golang’s installation and configuration with homebrew in Fish shell 1. Install golang with homebrew brew update brew search golang brew info golang # show the information of golang brew install golang 2. Setup the workspace: Add environment variables: First, we’ll need to tell Go the location of our workspace. We’ll add some environment variables into shell config. bash or zsh The config files is located at home directory:
